name: Sea Dogs: Legendary Edition
description:
JOIN OUR DISCORD



1654 AC. The Caribbean. A place of opportunities and mysteries. Take the role of Charles de Maure - a young French nobleman who arrived at the New World to assist his brother. What seemed to be a simple family matter, turned into a lifelong adventure. This is a story of the noble idler who became the most powerful man of the Caribbean. Riches, titles, power, romance - the ultimate booty awaits, it is up to you how to get it all. Become a pirate and terrorize the archipelago, take prizes in the sea and plunder cities. Or try to keep hands mostly clean - trade both goods and information, work for the state and help the folk. Get a ship, arm yourself, gather a crew of your dream, and find love. The New World is way too vast, too dangerous to explore it alone and there are always consequences for the choices you make!

Key Features

  • 10 years worth of DLCs and patches included
  • Epilogue which will sum up, in full, hundred of hours of your story and your choices
  • Over a dozen of new quests, including personal stories of your companions and love interests
  • Total rebalance: crafting, economy, RPG system, the difficulty curve
  • Flexible tuning of your gameplay experience: more detailed difficulty levels, in-game events, and other options
  • Colony building
  • New locations and scenery
  • More music, sound effects, and voice-overs
  • Revised engine and visuals

  • Companions and romance options
  • Naval warfare, both challenging and rewarding
  • Self-reliant and replayable story mode (over 200 hours of gameplay)
  • Challenging AI, crafting, trading, fighting, gambling
  • Freeplay mode, endless as an ocean
  • Hundreds of items and weapons
